section.title: Setting the Priority of a Failover Role

procedure.title: To Set the Priority of a Failover Role

step.para: Click on the Diagnostics accordion, then click the Zone that you want to view.
Depending on how you want to view your servers, click either the Roles by Servers tab or the Servers by Roles tab.
In the Status of Roles for Servers in Zone Default Zone area, click on the role that you want to set the priority for.

Click
(Configuration), and
(Promote Server) to make this the primary server for this role.

Click
(Configuration), and
(Demote Server) to demote the priority of this server for this role.
